generated_body: The article on Rip Taylor's cause of death is likely to provide an overview of the circumstances surrounding his passing, including any health issues that may have contributed to his death. It may also include comments from family members or close friends, reflecting on his life and career in the entertainment industry. Additionally, the piece could detail the arrangements for his memorial service, outlining when and where it will take place, and possibly mentioning any notable individuals expected to attend. Overall, it aims to present a factual account of his death and its impact on those who knew him.
